bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for Bus Design in Air Insulated Substations-Amendment
IEEE Draft Guide for Bus Design in Air Insulated Substations-Amendment
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P605a/D3, Nov 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The purpose of this amendment is to incorporate all the technical corrections and changes to improve the document after RevCom has approved it. This will provide a correct and more valuable guide to the substation engineer.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
